summary:
This MOD add a new ID dragons to leveled-list
WIP MOD
descriptionHtml:
日本語はReadmeタブの方をお読みください
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Description
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1.This MOD add a new ID dragons to leveled-list.
2.Dragon come down to the ground often. *need a landing area.
3.Add a powerful shout.
4.Some shout were adjust.
5.NPC Protection in combating.
6.Long distance attack is high Resistance.
7.WIP.

If you installed in the middle
Takes time to spawn.

[ ! ]Please back up your save

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Installation
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
install in Mod Manager.

>>http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1334
>>http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1840

=== Require ===

Skyrim ver:1.9.32 +
Dawnguard
Dragonborn

*There is a possibility to work with old version.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Uninstallation
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
End the battle with the dragon, and then move to the interrior cell.
uninstall after waiting 3 hours in the game time.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Q&A
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Q:Protective effect does not end
A:Please waiting 3 hours in the game. Please try to attack then.

Q:There are Actor that is not protected
A:Essential and spawn attributes not protect

Q:Magic effect description is different
A:takes time to fix. i'm not good at english

Q:Weapon damage has decreased
A:Disarm Effect has changed.
-Changed Shout List-
#Disarm >> 5 sec Weapon damage and Magicka and Magicka Regeneration 100% Decrease.
#UnreletingForce >> Blocking disable push effect and increase Damage (Enemy shout only)
#MarkForDeath >> Bugfix
#WhirlwindSprint >> Recast adjust


=== Dragon Resist list ===

OneHand >> 75%
TwoHand >> 55%
Archery >> 90%
Magic >> 85%

*Stagger is Melee Weapon & Shield only
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Know Bugs
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Dragon sound loop

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Recommended MOD
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Bellyaches HD Dragon Replacer Pack
>>http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29631

Convenient Horses
>>http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14950

The Dance of Death - A Killmove Mod
>>http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10906

Extension Follower MODs
Combat ReBalance MODs (I used Deadly Combat)

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Compatible & Conflict
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

=== Compatible ===

Dragon Combat Overhaul
>>http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32597
#add death animation of alduin
#AI will be overwritten

DFB - Random Encounters
>>http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11836

Extra Encounters
>>http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29688

Immersive Patrols
>>http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12977


[ ! ]Other Dragon MODs
Want to merge the Leveled-List for compatibility


=== Conflict ===

Run For Your Lives
>>http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23906
#does not get into house (My mod Dragons only)

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
SpecialThanks
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Bethesda Softworks
Skyrim Nexus - Skyrim mods and community
CK Wiki Japanese translation
author: yukimati

files.name: ADD Dragons WIP
files.changelogHtml:
BugFix - Bug that can not sleep/wait/FT
Detail - Dragon Breath Misconfiguration
SaveRecovery - Save after remove the Mod
修正 - 持続時間設定ミスによりブレス被弾後1000秒間、待機や寝る事ができなくなるバグを修正
修復 - 一度Modをアンインストールすることで参照先のIDが消える為、待機できるようになります
